description: The units for the code range for the service authorization request (SAR) service line. This table extracts the related multiple response SAR Service Groups (I RFL 235) item. Table SAR_SVC_RNGE contains additional information related to each row in this table. Join to it using the primary key columns in each table. Additionally, each row in these tables relates to a parent row in the SAR_SVC_LN_INFO table. Join to it using the REFERRAL_ID columns and SAR_SVC_LN_INFO.LINE = GROUP_LINE from these tables.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID for the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SAR_SVC_RNGE_UNITS
columns.description: The number of units for the service in related column SAR_SVC_RNGE__SAR_SVC_RNGE.
